imageAssets.description: Pixel art sprite for the player character 'Kye'. A small, friendly, androgynous humanoid figure, facing forward, ready for adventure. Style: clean 16-bit or 32-bit pixel art. Dominant colors: light theme friendly, e.g., Kye wears a blue shirt and khaki pants. Transparent background. Ideal for a 32x32 pixel tile.

Pixel art sprite for a sparkling diamond collectible. Classic faceted diamond shape. Bright, clear, or light blue, with a prominent sparkle/shine effect. Style: 16/32-bit pixel art. Transparent background. Ideal for a 32x32 pixel tile.

Pixel art sprite for a solid wall block. Textured like light gray stone bricks or clean metallic panels. Clearly impassable. Style: 16/32-bit pixel art. Square, designed to fill a 32x32 pixel tile. Light theme compatible.

Pixel art sprite for a generic floor tile. A simple, clean light gray or beige patterned tile, or very light grass texture. Subtle, not distracting. Style: 16/32-bit pixel art. Square, fills a 32x32 pixel tile.

Pixel art sprite for a pushable box. Looks like a light brown wooden crate or a simple, colored (e.g., light green) block. Clearly distinct from walls. Style: 16/32-bit pixel art. Square, fills a 32x32 pixel tile.

Pixel art sprite for a 'sticky' magnet block. Metallic gray with a subtle blue or red magnet symbol (U-shape or bar) or electric sparks. Distinct from other blocks. Style: 16/32-bit pixel art. Square, fills a 32x32 pixel tile.

Pixel art sprite for a 'Rocker' monster. A simple, round, red or orange creature with determined eyes, possibly with small horns or a grumpy expression. Looks like it would roll or slide. Style: 16/32-bit pixel art. Transparent background. Fits within a 32x32 pixel tile.

Pixel art sprite for an 'Eater' monster. A green or purple amorphous blob-like creature with a large, visible mouth, perhaps a single eye. Looks hungry. Style: 16/32-bit pixel art. Transparent background. Fits within a 32x32 pixel tile.

Pixel art sprite for a one-way arrow block, pointing UP. A block (perhaps light blue or gray) with a clear, contrasting white or yellow upward-pointing arrow icon on it. Style: 16/32-bit pixel art. Square, fills a 32x32 pixel tile.
Pixel art sprite for a one-way arrow block, pointing DOWN. Similar to UP arrow block, but arrow points down. Style: 16/32-bit pixel art. Square, fills a 32x32 pixel tile.
Pixel art sprite for a one-way arrow block, pointing LEFT. Similar to UP arrow block, but arrow points left. Style: 16/32-bit pixel art. Square, fills a 32x32 pixel tile.
Pixel art sprite for a one-way arrow block, pointing RIGHT. Similar to UP arrow block, but arrow points right. Style: 16/32-bit pixel art. Square, fills a 32x32 pixel tile.
